Headline: #66 Chicago Temporary Westbound Reroute near Chicago/Lockwood
ShortDescription: Westbound 66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted via Chicago, Laramie, Augusta, Central and Chicago due to street blockage near Chicago/Lockwood.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted via Chicago, Laramie, Augusta, Central and Chicago due to street blockage near Chicago/Lockwood.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
